sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: TeraWulf Reports Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Results
feed.summary: TeraWulf Inc. announced its financial and operational results for Q4 and full year 2025, highlighting that the fiscal year 2025 was a significant inflection point with the execution of long-term data center lease agreements totaling 522 critical IT MW and securing over $12.8 billion in long-term customer contracts. The company detailed its strategic focus on HPC hosting, capital formation, and a multi-year development pipeline aiming for annual delivery of 250-500 critical IT MW through 2030, supported by significant capital secured and ongoing construction at its Lake Mariner and Abernathy campuses.

feed.title: Willdan Group Inc (NASDAQ:WLDN) Stock Falls Despite Strong Earnings Beat on Revenue Miss and Cautious Outlook
feed.summary: Willdan Group Inc (NASDAQ:WLDN) reported strong Q4 2025 earnings, beating EPS estimates significantly, but missed revenue projections. Despite robust full-year growth and strategic acquisitions, the stock fell over 6% in after-hours trading due to investor concerns over the revenue miss and a cautious 2026 revenue outlook that is slightly below analyst consensus. The company emphasized its strategic positioning in high-demand markets like AI and data centers.

feed.title: VVR Stock Price, Forecast & Analysis | INVESCO SENIOR INCOME TRUST (NYSE:VVR)
feed.summary: This article provides an analysis of Invesco Senior Income Trust (NYSE:VVR), focusing on its stock price, market performance, and key statistics. It details the company's investment objective to provide high current income through floating or variable senior loans and notes its recent price movements. The article also includes technical analysis ratings and answers frequently asked questions about VVR.

feed.title: Select Medical (SEM) Issues 2026 Outlook After Margin Pressure: Is Its Earnings Power Repositioning?
feed.summary: Select Medical Holdings Corporation reported mixed Q4 and full-year 2025 results, with increased revenue but continued pressure on profitability. The company issued 2026 guidance, projecting revenues between US$5.6 billion to US$5.8 billion and EPS of US$1.22 to US$1.32, which frames its repositioned earnings power after a year of compressed margins. This outlook helps reset investor expectations regarding the company's ability to convert patient demand into healthier margins despite ongoing regulatory and cost pressures, particularly in critical illness recovery hospitals.

feed.title: Mizuho upgrades Arthur J. Gallagher stock rating on valuation
feed.summary: Mizuho upgraded Arthur J. Gallagher & Co. (NYSE:AJG) to Outperform from Neutral, setting a new price target of $260.00, down from $277.00. The upgrade is based on an estimated $6.2 billion of adjusted EBITDAC for the company's fifth through eighth quarters, applying a 13.7x enterprise value to EBITDAC multiple. Despite the lower price target, it represents an 18% upside from current levels, with Mizuho believing the insurance brokerage group is oversold.
